journal

sweets, halloween and a (re)start

15/11/2025 恋人へ (For Lovers) - Lamp

alright I'm just dropping these two...

YE BRO

I COOKS™


they were indeed very yummey, and I had great help with the dumps (actually made last xmas :P)
oh my, I hadn't had these in sooo long...
it had a good amount of sugar and love and happiness and deliciousness an... oh I wish I could eat it again T^T
welp, now I can stand by the name proudly. it's actually funny how much I enjoy cooking and everything about it -- the process, the un-fixed'ness, the reward of it all. just the right amount of nothing and everything by itself. my peaceful chaos. and I actually learned that it can be nice to do it with someone else !

anyways!
what. a. year.
has all my absence been 2 desserts? well....... kinda...
a lot has changed, I changed a lot, and changing is still happening right as I type these silly words. many ppl graced me with their presence and many diverged from my path, but it is always nice to make, and care for, friends, regardless of how much contact I maintain with them. this feels so distant from my past-self -- I don't think they would ever have had this much energy lol. tho maybe it was just stored somewhere. to top this off, it feels nice to pick it up from where I left! like caring for something stored in the attic (if I ever had one). tho now I believe I'm more code-organized B)

speaking of the "forgotten in the attic", i.e. The aboboraPurge.exe, no I didn't plan to ever touch this again. simply bc I wasn't relating to anything I was doing at the time. but guess what? now I feel like it :3. I have a lot of brain juice to input here and rework previous ideas, so I will be pestering this address a little longer ! I think it will continue to serve as an open diary that only I will fully comprehend
btw I do plan on making a more inviting reading journal, this is cool and all but doesn't seem long-term friendly

what can we bring here? hmmm
there's this very nice mystery visual-novel doomed-yuri that just came out (for FREE)

they're talking about me, aren't they?

the game name is Z.A.T.O. and I cannot stress enough how much u should try it out if u can. lots of brain foods and eye candies constantly hitting u by surprise. also the OST is radiant. this very screenshot talkin about the 'need' to be observed is deeply relating to various ideas of mine -- like, I even said that this website is an "open diary", so I can't deny the fact this is a way of getting attention, even if not explicitly -- and it's great to read/hear it somewhere else.

other than that, I had a spectacular Halloween
we did quite simple decorations, but they ended up looking so neat.
it's very comfy to spend some time w new frens and I got a couple of fun pics
here's some of them:

"omg the fire under the fake web and plants an" shush. lil August is taking care of everything.

that's it !
hope the new additions are entertaining enough in the meantime :3
